lead_paragraph: Donald Trump has big plans for the Old Post Office building, a historic structure in downtown Washington that he's pledging to transform into the city's most luxurious hotel. As for the White House, four blocks away? He's not saying.

headline.main: Trump Says DC Hotel Will Be Among World's Best
headline.print_headline: Trump Says DC Hotel Will Be Among World's Best

snippet: Donald Trump has big plans for the Old Post Office building, a historic structure in downtown Washington that he's pledging to transform into the city's most luxurious hotel. As for the White House, four blocks away? He's not saying....
